records.Description__c:
Have one 3-pack of soap mailed to you every quarter. That's a total of twelve soap bars (1 bar per month). 
Your purchase will fund a student's STEM program fees for fourteen months.

Handmade in small batches with all natural ingredients sourced within Africa. 1 individually wrapped bar. 
Ingredients - shea butter, coconut oil, avocado oil, pure aloe vera extract, African croton seed oil, natural soap base, and essential oils: orange, bergamot, geranium, and lemongrass.

Handmade in small batches with all natural ingredients sourced within Africa. Set of 3 individually wrapped soap bars. Ingredients - shea butter, coconut oil, avocado oil, pure aloe vera extract, African croton seed oil, natural soap base, and essential oils: orange, bergamot, geranium, and lemongrass.
